justification: “Participants completed two validated questionnaires measuring psychosis proneness, the Peters et al. Delusions Inventory, PDI …”
“Participants completed two validated questionnaires measuring psychosis proneness, … and the Cardiff Anomalous Perceptions Scale, CAPS.”

measured_by: sum of z-transformed PDI and CAPS scores
justification: “A global psychosis-proneness score (PPS) per subject was calculated by summing the global z-transformed CAPS- and PDI sum scores.”
“While the PDI measures an individual's proneness to delusional ideation …”
“… the CAPS assesses the tendency for hallucinatory experiences.”
